data.text: Nisuokhat Jisu'n biak-inna mipui diang iminchu khat-um chong kahoi arilla aleiom phakhan, thiampu kalian ngai, Dan karu ngai khat-um katar ngaikha inheiwa-ah
Jisu diang injuoti, “Keini diang heitiro, ang ranak naneiya hiwa ngaihi nithome? Emakli tume hiwa thonasik-ah ranak kanapeii?”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Kei innum nangnidiang rakelna naneikate, keidiang heitiru,
John'n baptism imintho kha, Pathian diang makheiya kajuobe emakli manmasi makheiya kajuobe?”
Halli inmani karra inbiakna inneiya inleiti, “Eini'n ‘Pathian diang makheiya’ niti inchu, ama'n natite halle ‘angjarra amakha ningngamna makme?’
Halli ‘Eini'n minring makheiya eii’ niti innum mipui'n eini kha lungnga innadeeng thatsik eii, ajarchu mipui'n John hi Pathian chongkachoi inkhat eii tia inlei.”
Khawa jarra inmani'n “Humakheiya kajuome jetmung tia inleimasang.”
Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Ang ranak kaneiya hiwa ngairakip kithome kei innum nangnidiang tinuning.”

Halli Ama'n hiwa chong minkhi nahi mipui diang karil aleiphut: “Apha inkhat-ah theibombil katho miring inkhat aleiom, rahuonkha chuon katho mi ngaidiang aminhuumma apha kasoot taksik-ah aleisi. Isa 5:1
Theibom rakhoolpha ahongtungnga ama'n suok inkhat rahuon katho mi ngaidiang ramparman kalei aleiminsi takkha rahuon katho mi ngai'n suokpa kha inleiwuok-ah iteii minchoi lekleiya injuominkir.
Halli ama'n suok inkhat aleiminsi nookjei, ama kha-um inwuok ah jakna kaomthei omchanna inrachaak ah kut karuok-ah inhongmin kirnookjei.
Khawasuoli inthum changna suok kha-um aleitir, inmani'n ama kha kase-ah inwuok-ah inleidenjuon.
Khawa khan rahuon mapu pa'n ati, ‘Angme kei'n kathosik? Kasapa kiminriang inkhat beihi kaminsi inchu inmani'n ama hi kaya inte!’
Takkha rahuon katho ngai'n amakha inmupha khan, inmani inkhatli inkhat inlei inti, ‘Hiwahi inluo kaluoksikpa kha eii, ama changsik kasuokkha einita enasik-ah eini'n amahi thattui!’
Inmani'n amakha inthat-ah halli akaluong kha rahuon raaltiang inleideengjuon.”
“Ama'n heiwata rahuon kangaak rakip ngaikha thatta, halli rahuon kha aleiilaak rahuon kangaak inkhat diang apesik eii,”
Jisu'n inmani diang ahei enna aleiti, “Angme, inthiang chong in iti?
Khawa lungchungnga kajuota miring rakip in alek alek ah inkoisik eii, halli khawa lung inn atu ka-ang diang ajuodeeng inchu ama kha rahut inchangsik eii.”
Khawapha takkhan thiampu kalian ngaili dan karu ngai'n Jisu kha surnasik inleingaidon, ajarchu inmani'n hiwa minkhina rilsena chonghi inmani diang eii tia inleijet, takkha inmani'n mipu kha inleichi.
Khale inruoiya inmani'n Jisu kha inmaruongnga chong rakel li surra, waikaroonpa li ranak kanei ngai kutchungnga peinasik inmani'n sialla inracho akatha inleem mi lekkhat Jisu kaensuisik inleiminsi.
Kaensui ngai'n Jisu diang inleiti, “Karu, nangchu kadik khat-um katuunna naminchu halli mi-um khoithen makche, takkha Pathian lungdou katuun kha naminchu tihi keini'n kijet.
Keini'n Caesar diang rampar pesik hi Dan khan koibe koimakbe?”
Takkha Jisu inmani ngaidon kathamak kha aleijet ah inmani diang aleiti,
“Dangkapum kha naminmuro, khawa khan atu ramil omme?”
Jisu'n inmani diang ati, “Caesar takha Caesar's diang peru, halli Pathian takha Pathian diang peru.”
Inmani'n mipui karra achongrilla Jisu kha leisur matormu, takkha ama masang nakhan inleingak ah inmani'n rilsik leijeitmuwa inomchianjei.
Khawa khan kathi makheiya kahongring ommak kati Sadducees lekkhat Jisu diang inheiwa ah injuoti, Chuon 23:8

halli inmani'n Jisu diang inleirakel, “Karu, Moses Dan in keini sik-ah aleimajia, ‘Atu ka-ang a-u inkhat numei leineiya asa omleiya a-upa athi inchu anaipa'n anumei kha neita a-upa sik-ah sa aneipi sik eii. Innidan 25:5
Ulenai sari inleiom, upapa khan numei aneili sa neileiya athijei.
Halli inni huuinapa'n aneinookjei,
khat-um inthum huuinapa innum aneinook jei, hiwa angnga sari ngai'n innei wiak ah sa neileiya inthiwiakjei.
Khawa suoli numeisanu um athijei.
Kha e-inle kathi makheiya hongringni khan numeisanu kha atu numei esik me? Ajarchu numeisanu kha mi sari numei alei ejei.”
Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Atuunnna khangnga sa ngachu inn innei khat-um inn neisik-ah azootpi.
Takkha kahongsik khang khat-um kathiya inphut ringna kamusik rahoi ejei tia inlei mi ngai khachu inn neinunu khat-um inn kanei ti omnunijei.
Ajarchu inmani kha woikhat thinunujei, ajarchu inmani kha marwaan tirton ngaile in-angjei, halli thiya inphut karing sa ngaikha in-e jarra Pathian sangai inejei.

Khawa jarra Moses innum, ‘Abraham Pathian, Isaac Pathian, khat-um Jacob Pathian tia’ akoilai khan kathi rakip inhongringjei tia Pumi jarra suulbuklai kaangna larik munkhan inthiangnga amalarjei. Suok 3:6
Khawa jarra amahi kathi Pathian emak takkha akaring Pathian eii, halli mi rakip in amadiang ringna inmusik eii.”
Dan karu lekkhat ngai'n inhongmasang, “Karu, katha ah namasangjei.”
Khawa makheiya inmani'n inngam hiaiya Jisu diang iteii leirakelzoot mujei.
Takkha Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Angtho thoa Christa hi nangni'n David phungrui eii ningtime?
Tichu David tak in ati Minpaakla larik ah,
Kei'n ninhalpui ngaikha naketouna kaminchang makleiseng.’
David innum ‘Pumi’; tia akoi inle, angtho thoa Messiah hi David's sapa eniame?”
Khale inruoiya mipui'n inrangaiya inom phakhan Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aheiti.

“Dan karu ngai makheiya insingtheiru, songkol inchuol inlukzoot, halli phaisungnga chubei inthosik kamanuom, Synagogue ngaikhan in-ongna kathakhet kakadang, mipui bubakna karra in-ong mun kahoikhet kakadang ngaikha in eii.
Inmani'n Chuulmei ngai innle-lei inkasut, halli aomchan kathoa kasoot ah Pathian kani, inmani ngai poongna kha kheella asedoomsik eii!”
